casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2018 Mr. Hugh Stevens, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Mr. Michael J. Tadych, Attorney at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Ms. Stephanie A. Brennan, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Folt, Carol L., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of May 2018 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2018."
